sentences.sContent: When a honeybee takes its first flight, it immediately releases its strong smelling meconium.
sentences.sContent_eng: When a honeybee takes its first flight, it immediately releases its strong smelling meconium.
sentences.sCn: 蜕变后的蜜蜂第一次起飞时，它会立刻将难闻的“蛹便”丢弃。

sentences.sContent: A honeybee may be limited by having comparatively few neurons, but it surely seems to squeeze everything it can out of them.
sentences.sContent_eng: A honeybee may be limited by having comparatively few neurons, but it surely seems to squeeze everything it can out of them.
sentences.sCn: 蜜蜂被相对较少的的神经元所限制，但可以确信的是，它似乎挤出了这些神以元所能做的一切。

sentences.sContent: Tarantula venom is weaker than that of a honeybee and, though painful, is virtually harmless to humans.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tarantula venom is weaker than that of a honeybee and, though painful, is virtually harmless to humans.
sentences.sCn: 狼蛛毒液的毒性比蜜蜂的都弱，被它咬一口尽管很疼，但事实上对人体无害。
